Innovative education services

Visit of Vanja Garaj

СDr. Vanja Garaj, the Lecturer in Creative Multimedia Design, School of Engineering and Design, Electronic and Computer Engineering Department of Brunel University (UK) visited KBTU in the period from April 26th to May 13th, 2013.

During his visit, Professor Vanja Garaj taught two-weeks module "Graphic and Web Designing" for “Multimedia Technologies” master students.

Vanja Garaj is PhD in Systems Design (Human Factors). He has the extensive professional experience in the field of Multimedia Technology and Computer Graphics, and he is the coordinator of the program in the field of Digital Media / Creative Multimedia Design.
